feature.label: PNML Framework SDK
feature.provider-name: Sorbonne UniversitÃ©s, UPMC Univ. Paris 06, CNRS UMR 7606 (LIP6)
feature.description:
PNML Framework is a library to help Petri net tools handle Petri Net Markup Language models, compliant with the ISO/IEC 15909 Standard. It thus enables Petri net tools to create, save, load and fetch PNML models.
NB: This plugin requires Eclipse Modeling Framework (EMF), therefore, you must also have EMF included in your Eclipse distribution.
This feature brands the complete PNML Framework library.
